input:
On the nightstand, you see a set of items arranged in a row: a burgundy bracelet, a turquoise mug, a pink crayon, a silver sheet of paper, a brown plate, and a green cat toy. What is the color of the left-most item?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
